title: Idris Elba and John Cena don prison uniforms to film The Suicide Squad at ex-jail in GA
text:
Golden Globe winner Idris Elba and WWE star John Cena suited up in orange prison uniforms and Crocs while shooting The Suicide Squad at a former jail in Georgia on Tuesday.

Filming for James Gunn's reboot reportedly took place at the former Augusta Richmond County Law Enforcement Center, which has been closed since 2014.

The 47-year-old Englishman and the Massachusetts-born 42-year-old are said to be playing DC Comic Book characters Vigilante and Peacemaker, respectively.

Orange is the new black! Golden Globe winner Idris Elba (L) and WWE star John Cena (R) suited up in orange prison uniforms and Crocs while shooting The Suicide Squad at a former jail in Georgia on Tuesday

Action! Filming for James Gunn's reboot reportedly took place at the former Augusta Richmond County Law Enforcement Center, which has been closed since 2014

Cena cryptically shared Instagram snaps Tuesday and Wednesday of The Shawshank Redemption climactic tunnel reveal and a go-directly-to-jail card from the Monopoly board game.

Joining Idris and John was Oscar winner Viola Davis wearing a white skirt suit and black pussy-bow blouse crafted by costume designer Judianna Makovsky.

The South Carolina-born 54-year-old - who's back as sociopathic government official Amanda Waller - is one of only four actors returning for the supervillain quasi-sequel.

The Suicide Squad welcomes back Margot Robbie, Joel Kinnaman, and Jai Courtney and introduces Pete Davidson, Nathan Fillion, Taika Waititi, Storm Reid, Michael Rooker, and Peter Capaldi.

Filming on the Warner Bros. Picture - hitting US theaters August 6, 2021 - is expected to last through December in Georgia and Panama.

David Ayer's 2016 original amassed $746.8M at the global box office despite a scathing 27% critic approval rating (out of 363 reviews) on Rotten Tomatoes.

But fans can next catch the Margot Robbie spin-off, Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn, when it hits US/UK theaters February 7.
